snippet.title: Galactic Civilizations IV: Supernova Launches October 19
snippet.description:
Wishlist: http://steam.gs/l/vx9uw/auggameplaytrailer

Step into the role of the leader of Earth's colonization efforts. With the advent of Faster-Than-Light travel, the galaxy is now open to exploration. 

But you're not alone. Competing alien civilizations are making their mark too. It's up to you to guide humanity towards success and survival.

--- 
Galactic Civilizations IV:
Website - https://www.galciv4.com/
Discord - https://discord.gg/galciv
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/GalCiv/
Twitter - http://twitter.com/galciv
Reddit -  https://www.reddit.com/r/GalCiv/

#strategygames #pcgaming #trailer
